nodes.text: Xibariz was a planet located in the Inner Rim region. The author and historian Eloc Throno wrote the book The Traveler's Guide to Xibariz, subtitled "A Journey Through Perpetual Twilight," as a guide for visitors to the planet. Throno also included Xibariz on a map in Traveler's Guide to Batuu, a similar book detailing the planet Batuu.
Xibariz was mentioned in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: Traveler's Guide to Batuu, a 2020 reference book written by Cole Horton.
